title: 394: CHATTY BROS: Bro-Line!
itunes:title: 394: CHATTY BROS: Bro-Line!
description:
The Bros introduce a new segment called Bro-Line where members of the #broadsquad zoom in to ask for advice! In today’s episode they chat the question “Is it true, if he wanted to he would…”. In-laws that hate you, sleeping in separate beds, and parenting a 3 year who’s going on 35! Thank you to broads Aliza, Elyanna, Ali, and Sarah!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***KETTLE AND FIRE: Go to KETTLEANDFIRE.COM and use code CHATTY for 20% off!

***RO.DERM: New members will receive 10% off of eyelash growth serum at RODERM.COM/CHATTY + free shipping and free and unlimited follow-ups with your healthcare provider to support you throughout your eyelash growth journey!

***VEGAMOUR: Go to VEGAMOUR.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to save 20% on your first order! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
